title: #17 #GayWeddingCakes and #MuslimBakeries? Plus Paul Joseph Watson!
description: This week, we discuss the Indiana controversy, what it means for religious liberties as well as my latest viral video, in which I requested gay wedding cakes from Muslim bakeries.  Plus, we're joined by the wonderful Paul Joseph Watson of PrisonPlanet to discuss radical feminism!
